name: random_maze
description:
rar file, unzip and play.

WASD - move
LMB - shot
R - reload
Shift - run

Continuous challenge casual game.

Survive your way to the other side of the maze to find the next maze.
A shotgun that needs to be reloaded every 12 shots and a life bar that doesn't recharge with every new challenge. 
Bats coming out of nowhere might want your blood.
